about_the_game:
In "The Tunnel", player take on the role of an unnamed soul who find himself in a place no one would ever wish to end up. Trapped within a labyrinth of tunnels, you must press forward, constantly on edge, unsure of what might be lurking around every corner. With only two companions by your side – your lantern and a pistol – survival is possible. The lantern will be your guiding light through the dark corridors, and the pistol your defense against the nightmares that haunt the tunnels.

As you climb higher, using ladders that offer a faint hope of reaching the surface, you’ll uncover fragments of the story – mysterious paper notes left behind by someone else, offering cryptic hints as to how you ended up in this nightmare. But one question looms large: Can you make it out alive?




Key Features

- Navigate through three floors of a complex tunnel system, filled with a haunting atmosphere.

- Light the dark passages with your trusty lantern to uncover what lurks ahead.

- Fight back with a pistol against lurking monsters, including zombies and demonic hounds.

- Use electrical mechanisms to unlock new routes and push forward.

- Seal gas leaks to clear your path and avoid deadly hazards.

- Discover scattered paper notes, remnants from a previous lost soul, offering cryptic insights.


Hint: Ammo is limited, so make every shot count!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible

short_description: Awakened in a mysterious place, with no memory of how you got there. Your only companions are your trusty lantern and a weapon. Every step you take, you can't shake the feeling that something's watching. Can you find your way out?
